articles.title: Explosion and fire at Taunton home seriously injures mother and 2-year-old child
articles.description:
The three-family home on Plain Street was destroyed Wednesday morning.

The post Explosion and fire at Taunton home seriously injures mother and 2-year-old child appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explosion and fire destroyed a three-family home on Plain Street in Taunton.
A mother and her 2-year-old child were seriously injured in the incident.
Local authorities are investigating the cause and assessing community safety measures.

articles.title: Swayman: Team USA ‘should have reacted differently’ to Trump’s joke about US women’s hockey team
articles.description:
"We have so much respect for the women’s team, and to share that gold medal with them is something that we’re forever grateful for."

The post Swayman: Team USA ‘should have reacted differently’ to Trump’s joke about US women’s hockey team appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jeremy Swayman criticized Team USA's response to Trump's joke about the women's hockey team.
Swayman expressed gratitude for sharing the gold medal with the women's team.
The incident highlights ongoing discussions about respect for women's sports in Boston.

articles.title: MSPCA-Angell evacuates nearly 50 animals, opens shelter to pets from Cape homes without power
articles.description:
MSPCA-Angell evacuated animals from its Cape Cod shelter amid dealing with a power outage caused by Monday’s nor’easter.

The post MSPCA-Angell evacuates nearly 50 animals, opens shelter to pets from Cape homes without power appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: MSPCA-Angell evacuated nearly 50 animals due to a power outage from Monday's nor’easter.
The shelter is now accepting pets from Cape homes affected by the outage.
Local residents can seek temporary shelter for their pets during this emergency.

articles.title: A small town arts scene in Vermont is among the best in America, according to USA Today readers
articles.description:
The charming town is "bursting with arts and culture."

summary: Vermont's arts scene recognized as one of America's best by USA Today readers.
The town features numerous galleries and cultural events, attracting visitors from Boston.
Local Boston artists may find inspiration and collaboration opportunities in Vermont's vibrant community.

articles.title: Not in Boston? Your space saver is likely illegal
articles.description:
Drivers may be trying to save their hard-earned shoveled-out spaces after the blizzard, yet most communities ban the practice.

The post Not in Boston? Your space saver is likely illegal appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Many Boston residents are illegally reserving parking spaces after recent snowstorms.
Communities across Massachusetts, including Boston, typically ban space-saving practices.
Violating space-saving laws can lead to fines and conflicts among neighbors.

articles.title: ESPN insider has Roman Anthony ranked among MLB’s top-10 corner outfielders
articles.description:

summary: Roman Anthony is ranked among MLB's top-10 corner outfielders by ESPN.

This recognition could boost fan interest and support for the Red Sox.

articles.title: The story behind this viral photo of an unplowed Fall River street
articles.description:
“Hopefully we get it plowed at some point today, but I’m not holding my breath.”

The post The story behind this viral photo of an unplowed Fall River street appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Viral photo shows unplowed street in Fall River, raising concerns among residents.
Residents express frustration over delayed snow removal amid winter storm on February 25.
City officials face pressure to improve snow clearing services for public safety.
